title: Vaccine
cleaned_text: The Vaccine is a Rare Medicine in [Unturned 3](/wiki/Unturned). When used, it restores the Player's restores [The Player](/wiki/The_Player) [Immunity](/wiki/Immunity_(Status)) by ] The Vaccine can [Medical and crafted with [Metal Can](/wiki/Metal_Can), Trivia:[ ] - The Vaccine model was reused for the [Morphine](/wiki/Morphine)and [Adrenaline](/wiki/Adrenaline). - The way in which the Vaccine is used in-game is very inaccurate compared to how a vaccine is used in real-life. In real life, a vaccine is taken before a disease is contracted in order to protect against it, not taken after the fact to reduce the severity of an infection. The usage difference might be due to game balancing reasons., [The Player](/wiki/The_Player)being able craft their own Vaccine using a [Metal Can](/wiki/Metal_Can), [Bricks](/wiki/Bricks), [Glue](/wiki/Glue), and [Chemicals](/wiki/Chemicals)is a joke about how certain groups of uneducated people like to inaccurately say vaccines are made from "dangerous chemicals," "toxic aluminum," and "ground up bricks", despite the fact that they are not made of these items. |Survival (Unturned 3)| | | Nutritious Rhubarb Onion Blue Mushroom Pizza Blue Mushroom Pizza Slice Brown Mushroom Pizza
